sentences.sContent: Do you think Hippomenes deserved to win the race?
sentences.sCn: 你认为希波墨涅斯应该（算）赢吗？

sentences.sContent: However, when he saw Atlanta come out of her house to run, Hippomenes changed his mind.
sentences.sCn: 然而，当他看到亚特兰大从她的房子出来跑步的时候，希波墨涅斯改变了他的心意。

trans.tranCn: 希波墨涅斯（男名；古希腊人名）
trans.tranOther: the husband, in some traditions, of Atalanta
